ValidationRule.description: Once assigned, only an Assigned User can modify
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( NOT ISBLANK( Assigned_To__c ) ,Assigned_To__r.Badge_Number__c <> $User.Badge_Number__c ,TEXT(Request_Status__c) <> "Hold - Missing Info" ,TEXT(Request_Status__c) <> "Open" ,NOT ISNEW() ,TEXT(Request_Status__c) <> "Cancelled" ,TEXT(Request_Status__c) <> "Closed" ,NOT BEGINS(TEXT(Request_Status__c), "Rejected")
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: (004) The request has already been assigned. You cannot modify this request at this time.
